item.title: CM Siddaramaiah inaugurates development projects worth Rs 936 cr in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur (Karnataka), Jun 23 (PTI) Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah on Monday inaugurated development works totalling Rs 936 crore in the Raichur assembly constituency, reaffirming the Congress governmentâ€™s commitment to delivering on its promises.
He was speaking after inaugurating the Tribal Cultural Festival organised by the Scheduled Tribes Welfare Department and the District Administration, unveiling the nameplate of Adikavi Maharshi Valmiki University, and participating in the 371st...]]>
